actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs, S. Rept. 95-408.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Similar provisions passed in H.R. 6951 as passed House.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act.
short_title: Council on Wage and Price Stability Amendments

summary.text: Council on Wage and Price Stability Amendments -- Amends the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act to expand the duties of the Council on Wage and Price Stability to include, among other revisions, review of information about and analysis of the effects on the economy of certain aspects of foreign trade and investment, world energy supplies and weather patterns, and interest rates and capital formation. Directs that voluntarily submitted materials deemed by the council to be confidential, as well as confidential materials required to be submitted to the Council, not be disclosed to any person who is not a Council employee. Extends the authority of the council through September, 1979.

titles.title: Council on Wage and Price Stability Amendments
A bill to amend the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act.
